title: PetSafe ScoopFree Odor Control Crystal Cat Litter, Fresh Scent, 4.3 Lb Bag, Pack of 2
description: This crystal cat litter is designed to offer a new level of freshness and cleanliness to your home, absorbing urine and drying solid waste quickly to eliminate odors five times faster than traditional clumping clay litter. It's low tracking and is 99% dust-free, which means less time sweeping the floor and cleaning the litter box. One 4.3 lb bag can last up to 30 days in a single-cat household. Can be used with any brand litter box or reusable tray.
